comments:
Build ID: N20070714-0010

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open a class (I got the error while working with SaveableCompareEditorInput.java)
2. From popup menu select Refactor > Extract Superclass
3. On a dialog click Add required

=> You should get an exception similar to this:
